newsitem.title: HUNGARY: SOCCER-HUNGARY, NORWAY NAME TEAMS FOR WORLD QUALIFIER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-HUNGARY, NORWAY NAME TEAMS FOR WORLD QUALIFIER.

text.p: Hungary and Norway on Saturday named their teams for World Cup Group Three qualifier to be played on Sunday.
Gabor Babos; Emil Lorincz, Janos Banfi, Attila Kuttor; Tibor Dombi, Laszlo Farkashazy, Tamas Sandor, Gabor Halmai, Norbert Nagy; Ferenc Orosz, Zoltan Kovacs+++
Frode Grodaas; Alf-Inge Haland, Henning Berg, Ronny Johnsen, Stig Inge Bjorneby; Petter Rudi, Erik Mykland, Kjetil Rekdal, Oyvind Leonhardsen, Frank Strandli; Tore A. Flo
